text: Is python good enough for big applications
From the moment I faced python the only thing I can say for it is "It is awesome".
I am using Django framework for it and I am amazed how quick the things happen and how developer friendly this language is.
But from many sides I hear that Python is scripting language, and very useful for small things, experiments etc.
So the question is can a big and heavy loaded application be build in python(and django).
I am mainly focused on the web development so for examples I can give Stack Overflow, Facebook, Amazon etc.
According to many of the answers maybe I have to rephrase the question.
There are several big application working on Python(the best example You Tube) so it can handle them but why then it is no so popular for large projects as(for example) JAVA, C++ and .NET.
